inclusion.criterion: transposition of the great arteries (TGA or ccTGA) with two-ventricle circulation
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: review of patient medical records to collect demographic information, medical and surgical details
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Type of TGA, TGA complexity, type of surgery, age at surgery, reoperation
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Cardio-vascular events such as atrial arrhythmia, heart failure, pacemaker implantation
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Performing electrophysiologic exploration and its results: normal or inducible sustained VT/VF
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: 24H Holter ECG finding: sinus node disease, atrial arrhythmia, non-sustained VT, sustained VT
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Notion of complete pregnancy (> 20 weeks of gestation)
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Baseline data will be taken at the first assessment as an adult (> 16 years old). They include variables from clinical status, 12-lead ECG, transthoracic echocardiography, CMR (if available), cardiopulmonary exercise test, and laboratory tests (if available)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Clinical status: NYHA function class, syncope and palpitations
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Electrocardiographic parameters, including rhythm assessment, heart rate, QRS duration, and QT interval manually collected
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Echocardiographic parameters with visual sRVEF, tricuspid regurgitation grade, presence of pulmonary stenosis and baffle stenosis or leak
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Data on all adult patients (>16 years of age) with sRV under active follow-up between January 1, 2000 and September 30, 2018 will be recorded
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has history of CAD, prior MI, HLD, HTN, ventricular tachycardia, and syncope. He was recently discharged after a negative work-up for syncope which included the implantation of a cardiac monitoring device.
